img_summary: The image depicts a decorative tray holding small, round, white objects, likely seeds. Based on the preceding text, this image is associated with "Monkey-Head Fungus Seeds," a rare seed item obtained upon defeating the Fungiworm in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The image serves to visually represent this in-game collectible.
